pullrequest.title: opende: disabling dynamic moi rescaling by default in compiler

content.raw:
> Without addressing what the default behavior should be, I would prefer creating an option that the user can select. It's more flexible than #ifdef's since it's changeable without recompiling.

So what's the plan, then?
content.html:
Without addressing what the default behavior should be, I would prefer creating an option that the user can select. It's more flexible than #ifdef's since it's changeable without recompiling.

So what's the plan, then?
